page.title: 16Farming Around Inverbervie
page.content: On our D block there are ten farms ranging in area from eighty to five hundred acres. Every farm has crops of some kind, even dairy and sheep farms, because you need crops to feed the animals. The type of farms in this area are dairy, arable, sheep and mixed. Arable farms deal with crops which are sold either to other farmers or to factories. Each farm with crops in our D block has some of these crops below: grass, spring barley, winter barley, wheat, winter wheat, oilseed rape. potatoes, turnips, strawberries, raspberries, blackcurrants. Farmers have machinery to assist them. Machinery includes: tractor, bogie, plough, cultivator combine-harvester, seed sower, sprayer, hay-turner, baler, bale collector, mower, foliage cutter, fork, shovel, potato planter.
